title: Vengeance
description: Ten years after the brutal murder of his mother, Denrele Mayo, now grown into manhood, resurfaced into Benin Empire to seek vengeance. Unknown to him, he had returned to an Empire that desperately needed a savior. He didn't want to be that savior. He wanted vengeance and only that.On his vengeful path, he ignorantly aided the destroyer, losing his friends and his love, Lara. Everything fell apart. Humanity stood at the brink of destruction. Denrele must now look beyond his own vendetta and be the hero he didn't intend to be.
author: A.B. Joseph
